CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(VG_Is_MTA__c), (VG_Risk_Premium__c)*((( Base_Creation_End_Date__c - Base_Creation_Start_Date__c )+1)/365), CASE( VG_MTA_Type__c , "Extension", ((((VG_MTA_End_Date__c - VG_MTA_Start_Date__c)+1)/365)* (VG_Risk_Premium__c) ), "Cancellation", -1*(((( VG_Pre_MTA_Expiry_Date__c - VG_MTA_Cancellation_Date__c)+1)/365)* (VG_Risk_Premium__c)), "Revision of Cover", (VG_Risk_Premium__c)*((( Base_Creation_End_Date__c - Base_Creation_Start_Date__c )+1)/365), "Declaration", (VG_Risk_Premium__c)*((( Base_Creation_End_Date__c - Base_Creation_Start_Date__c )+1)/365)* VG_Declaration_Type_percent__c , VG_Risk_Premium__c ) )
CustomField.label: Risk Premium ( DO NOT USE)
